note.p: Swiss protestant missionary. Studied at St Chrischona Missionary College, Basel. Employed by the South American Missionary Society of London at Lebu, Lota and Quiapo in Araucania (Chile), from 1864. Pastor at Emanuel United Church of Christ, Bridesburg, Pennsylvania, from 1872.
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 May 2020)
